description:
Connect 4 is a popular two-player strategy game where the objective is to connect four discs of the same color vertically, horizontally, or diagonally.

You can play Connect 4 online with other players from all over the world.

There are many websites and mobile apps that offer online versions of the game, allowing you to challenge your friends or play against random opponents. Some of these platforms also offer different variations of the game, such as Connect 5 or Connect 6, to keep things interesting. So, if you're looking for a fun and challenging game to play online, Connect 4 is definitely worth a try!
name: connect 4 online
